Pixelart Player - Simple & Modern Digital Signage Player

Do you want great screen displays, but without all the hassle? Download the Pixelart Player App to manage your screen network with complete ease from anywhere at any time. With Pixelart you can publish campaigns to display beautiful content on your screens in minutes.

Turn any screen into a beautiful Digital Signage display!

Pixelart. Engage Your Audience.

STEP 1: Install this app to Chrome Browser.
STEP 2: Register your app at https://cms.pixelart.ai

For more information visit https://pixelart.ai
